Golden Mask: Allows you to choose the Pokemon you want from the dungeon! Cannot be used alongside a Wishing Star.
Lost Loot: Grants an additiona +5,000 Pok√© upon completing a dungeon!
Wonder Chest: Grants your team's characters +5 levels! Cannot be used alongside a Tera Orb.
Tera Orb: Grants your team's characters +10 levels! Cannot be used alongside a Wonder Chest.
Wishing Star: Allows you to choose the Potion or Juice you want from the dungeon! Cannot be used alongside a Golden Mask.
